author: Caitlin Owens
title: Trump's huge coronavirus gamble
description: President Trump is eager to ease off of stringent coronavirus mitigation steps “soon,” he said yesterday, but that would have a calamitous impact on Americans’ health — and it’s not clear how much it would help the economy, either. Why it matters: For now, th…
content:
President Trump is eager to ease off of stringent coronavirus mitigation steps soon, he said yesterday, but that would have a calamitous impact on Americans health  and its not clear how much it would help the economy, either.
